summary: This is an email from journalist Ryan Hooper of the Press Association in London to an unspecified recipient, inquiring about the status of the US v. Ghislaine Maxwell trial. The journalist asks whether the trial is still scheduled to begin on November 29, 2021, if the defendant plans to testify, and the trial's expected duration, noting difficulty in reaching the court directly.

persons.name: Ryan Hooper
persons.context: A journalist with the Press Association in London who is emailing to inquire about the status, schedule, and details of the Ghislaine Maxwell trial.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The defendant in the referenced criminal case 'US v. Maxwell'; the email inquires about the status of her trial and whether she is due to give evidence.

events.title: Scheduled Opening of US v. Maxwell Trial
events.description: The planned opening date for the criminal trial of Ghislaine Maxwell, as referenced in the journalist's query.

keyFacts: A journalist is seeking confirmation that the trial of Ghislaine Maxwell (US v. Maxwell) is still scheduled to open on November 29, 2021.
The journalist is also inquiring whether the defendant, Ghislaine Maxwell, is due to give evidence at the trial.
The email indicates the journalist had difficulty contacting the court directly via the provided phone number (212 637 2600).
